name: Suitable AI Inc.
description: Operator of employee referral platform designed to leverage referrals system and harness the power of team networks. The company's platform engages the employees in the hiring process with gamification and allows them to seamlessly track jobs, referrals & rewards, enabling recruiters to connect with potential talent from their social and professional networks.
one_liner: Operator of employee referral platform designed to leverage referrals system and harness the power of team networks.
